options.name: meta
options.description: Metadata for a brand, including the brand name and important links. See [Meta](#meta) for more information

options.name: logo
options.description: Provide definitions and defaults for brand's logo in various formats and sizes. See [Logo](#logo) for more information

options.name: color
options.description: The brand's custom color palette and theme. See [Color](#color) for more information

options.name: typography
options.description: Typography definitions for the brand. See [Typography](#typography) for more information

options.name: defaults
options.description: Default settings

options.name: name
options.description: The brand name.

options.name: link
options.description: Important links for the brand, including social media links. If a single string, it is the brand's home page or website. Additional fields are allowed for internal use.

options.name: images
options.description: A dictionary of named logo resources.

options.name: small
options.description: A link or path to the brand's small-sized logo or icon, or a link or path to both the light and dark versions.

options.name: medium
options.description: A link or path to the brand's medium-sized logo, or a link or path to both the light and dark versions.

options.name: large
options.description: A link or path to the brand's large- or full-sized logo, or a link or path to both the light and dark versions.

options.name: palette
options.description: The brand's custom color palette. Any number of colors can be defined, each color having a custom name.

options.name: foreground
options.description: The foreground color, used for text.

options.name: background
options.description: The background color, used for the page background.

options.name: primary
options.description: The primary accent color, i.e. the main theme color. Typically used for hyperlinks, active states, primary action buttons, etc.

options.name: secondary
options.description: The secondary accent color. Typically used for lighter text or disabled states.

options.name: tertiary
options.description: The tertiary accent color. Typically an even lighter color, used for hover states, accents, and wells.

options.name: success
options.description: The color used for positive or successful actions and information.

options.name: info
options.description: The color used for neutral or informational actions and information.

options.name: warning
options.description: The color used for warning or cautionary actions and information.

options.name: danger
options.description: The color used for errors, dangerous actions, or negative information.

options.name: light
options.description: A bright color, used as a high-contrast foreground color on dark elements or low-contrast background color on light elements.

options.name: dark
options.description: A dark color, used as a high-contrast foreground color on light elements or high-contrast background color on light elements.

options.name: link
options.description: The color used for hyperlinks. If not defined, the `primary` color is used.

options.name: fonts
options.description: Font files and definitions for the brand.

options.name: base
options.description:
The base font settings for the brand. These are used as the default for all text.
 See [base](#base) for more information.

options.name: headings
options.description: Settings for headings. See [headings](#headings) for more information.

options.name: monospace
options.description: Settings for monospace text. See [monospace](#monospace) for more information.

options.name: monospace-inline
options.description: Settings for inline code. See [monospace-inline](#monospace-inline) for more information.

options.name: monospace-block
options.description: Settings for code blocks. See [monospace-block](#monospace-block) for more information.

options.name: link
options.description: Settings for links. See [link](#link) for more information.
